attributes.action: I ask the UK government to respect MSPs rejection to EU Withdrawal Bill
attributes.additional_details: So, if MSPs vote against it, then the UK government must listen to what the Scottish government want them to do and that means making amendments before the Britain leaves the European Union, so that we can respect the devolution settlement.
attributes.background: The Scottish Parliament has refused to give the UK government consent to the EU Withdrawal Bill.  Because it undermines the devolution settlement.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific amendments you'd like to see to the EU (Withdrawal) Bill.
